ygData.subject: Re: suggestions to Verant
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/28/99 2:32:57 PM US Mountain Standard Time, mprez20@aol.com writes:
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/28/99 2:32:57 PM US Mountain Standard Time,
mprez20@... writes:

<< I for one belive in the power of the wizard and I do know that brad and
verant have absolutely no intent of changing them. I quote "Wizards are by
far the most balanced casting class and to change anything to them now would
destroy 1 years worth of game balancing".
>>
well it sounds like they don't want to change it because they worked on it
for a year. Well maybe they should work on it for 2 years then. Ahhhh if
only people would just say "oohhhh i worked on it for a year i guess i'm
done, no need to go any further" sounds like brad and Verant have somethig
against wizards :)

Parthon lvl 12
